titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7667

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, Aug 22d 1862.
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec of State
Sir
A. B. Brown Comd: 2d. Lieut: dated Aug 22d. 1862. Comm: issd. & delivered.

John I. Matthews Comd. Surgeon 32d Inf: dated Aug 23d. 1862 & delivered.
Wm P. Kinkead 2 Lieut date Aug 23, 1862
Tho. P. Dudley 2 Lieut -- -- -- --
Wm C. Peyton " -- " -- " -- " -- " -- "
Wm H. Searcy " -- " -- " -- " -- " -- "
Over
Lieut: Ben H. Howser resigned -- date of Com: Nov. 15. 1861,
Capt: Charles Obit not accepted -- date of Com: Aug 6. 1862 --
Lieut: Charles Obit resigend -- date of Com: May 9. 1862 --
Lieut: Jesse C. Adkisson resigned -- date of Com: Nov. 11. 1861 --
Lieut: Riley Wilson resigned -- date of Com: Ap. 13. 1862 --
Lieut: W. H. Norris resigned -- date of Com: Nov. 29. 1861 --
Capt: W. Treadle resigned -- date of Com: Nov. 13. 1861 --
Lieut: S. Huber resigned -- date of Com: Ap. 1. 1862
Capt: Jno. A. Morrison resigned -- date of Com: Oct 19. 1861 --
Lieut: James M. Davenport -- promoted date of Com: Nov 22. 1861 --
Lieut: Henry Waller Lieut: promoted date of Com: Nov 13. 1861 --
Lieut: James R. Watts -- promoted date of Com: Nov 13. 1861 --

I am
Respy
John W. Finnell
Adj Genl. Ken Vols:
